review: I have 3 Roku's and ChromeCast, and all put together they aren't as good as fire tv.  Being able to sideload apps is gold, Kodi (XBMC) runs like a charm.
author: Blaze

review: Just incredible. I've been a Prime member for two years and own the Amazon Prime box for streaming TV. My college age daughter wanted one like mine, so when Prime released this little gem, I immediately snagged it for her. She loves it and uses it with her own Prime school account. Another winner, Amazon! Keep bringing us innovative products like this one!
author: KY girl living in L.A.

review: I  love it, thinking about getting another one for my room.
author: Theresa Kolb

review: My wife loves this product. She is able to watch her TV shows and NETFLIX. She is extremely happy and loves the versatility of the product. I got it at a great price too.It runs a little hot though.
author: Arif Amjad

review: The stick itself was fine.  The problem was I did not realize the stick itself needs to be attached to its own power source.  I thought it was free-standing like a flash drive.  They don't show it with a power cord sticking out.To make matters worse, the cord they provide is only 3 Ft long, barely enough to reach an outlet unless the outlet is directly behind the TV.  I had to spend another 15$ to get an adaptor b/c the port is not a standard micro port.
author: JustMe "Corinne"

review: I love my Fire Stick. It is great way to use more of  my Prime benefits. Having access  to not only the Prime offerings but the other apps and games on a big screen is amazing.
author: Victoria Fain

review: I get serious lag while trying to stream netflix despite a strong wifi signal. Has unresponsive controls sometimes.  Needs occasional restarts.  It still streams better than my cheap smart TV,  so that a bonus.
